raw_text: SOMANADER – SHIRLEY WIGNARAJAH – Beloved son of the late Douglas and Hilda Somanader and Son In Law of the late Robert & Selvaranee Setukavalar of Batticaloa. Loving husband of late Rajini (Nee Setukavalar),​ devoted father of Dr Douglas (Lakshan) and Dr Dhanusha,​ father-in-Law of Menaka and Dr Sri Kumaran,​ and loved grandfather of Sherah and Joella,​ brother of Ashley and Vimala Arnold and the late Kingsley,​ Leslie and Anesley (Indran). Brother-in-Law of Juliana (Melbourne),​ Sunthari (Melbourne) Iris (Canada) Balan,​ Rabi,​ Vino,​ Setu (Suhen),​ Jayen & Premini (Sri Lanka). Uncle of Adrian & Nirmini Somanader. Funeral will take place at St John the Baptist Anglican Church,​ Lilydale,​ Melbourne on Tuesday the 28th November at 10AM. Live stream link for Shirley Somanader: https:/​/​vimeo.com/​event/​3907633. Friends and relatives please accept this intimation. Contact : s​e​t​u​k​a​v​a​l​a​r​@​g​m​a​i​l​.​c​o​m​077817
